original_title: The Battle of Comm Ave.: Boston University vs. Boston College
overview: Take a gripping journey through the Boston University-Boston College rivalry's storied history, defining moments and recent glories. These legendary programs have gone at each other for nearly a century. Each team measures its own success--at least in part--by its performance against the other. They've recruited the same kids, battled for the same titles, and chase the same championship.
title: The Battle of Comm Ave.: Boston University vs. Boston College
